metadata.title: Foxp3 + T reg cells in humoral immunity

abstract.original_text: germinal centre reaction. However, the mechanisms by which they exert this control are still under investigation. In this review, we discuss the effects of T reg cells on humoral immunity and the mechanisms by which they exert their regulatory function.

sentences.segment_text: However , the mechanisms by which they exert this control are still under investigation .
In this review , we discuss the effects of T reg cells on humoral immunity and the mechanisms by which they exert their regulatory function .
